description:
Provides an Equinix Metal project resource to allow you manage devices
in your projects.

-> Keep in mind that Equinix Metal invoicing is per project, so creating many `packet_project` resources will affect the rendered invoice. If you want to keep your Equinix Metal bill simple and easy to review, please re-use your existing projects.

Asn.description: Autonomous System Number for local BGP deployment.

DeploymentType.description: `private` or `public`, the `private` is likely to be usable immediately, the `public` will need to be review by Equinix Metal engineers.

Md5.description: Password for BGP session in plaintext (not a checksum).

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

BackendTransfer.description: Enable or disable [Backend Transfer](https://metal.equinix.com/developers/docs/networking/backend-transfer/), default is false.

OrganizationId.description: The UUID of organization under which you want to create the project. If you leave it out, the project will be create under your the default organization of your account.

PaymentMethodId.description: The UUID of payment method for this project. The payment method and the project need to belong to the same organization (passed with `organization_id`, or default).
